body_html:
I could build and run the test using Address Sanitizer , however we are not getting any memory related information , getting the same output as we got without this option.

Commands which I used :

$ bazel build -c opt --copt -fsanitize=address --linkopt -fsanitize=address //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
$ pip install /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.*
$ bazel test -c opt --copt -fsanitize=address --linkopt -fsanitize=address  //tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests:array_elementwise_ops_test_cpu_parallel

body:
I could build and run the test using Address Sanitizer , however we are not getting any memory related information , getting the same output as we got without this option.

Commands which I used : 
```
$ bazel build -c opt --copt -fsanitize=address --linkopt -fsanitize=address //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
$ bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package /tmp/tensorflow_pkg
$ pip install /tmp/tensorflow_pkg/tensorflow-1.*
$ bazel test -c opt --copt -fsanitize=address --linkopt -fsanitize=address  //tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests:array_elementwise_ops_test_cpu_parallel
```
